header: Jesus Teaches on the Mountain about Saying What Is Wrong in Others

verse: “Do not say what is wrong in other people’s lives. Then other people will not say what is wrong in your life.

header: Jesus Teaches about Houses Built on Rock or Sand

verse: Then Jesus finished talking. The people were surprised and wondered about His teaching.
He was teaching them as One Who has the right and the power to teach. He did not teach as the teachers of the Law.
